__e: Hello, everyone, I'm Andy Bernard, and I am going to take that bitch home.
You tried to steal Bernard from me, and for this you will die!
My brother Bernard, shot and left to die in the woods.
- Bernard, I've to talk with you. - Me too, but not here.
Bernard, I swear this isn't what it looks like.
I wonder what's happened to Bernard.
I believe it was George Bernard Shaw who once quipped,
George Bernard Shaw said, "You don't live longer. It just seems longer. "
You know what Bernard Shaw says about working women?
